mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.url, a.source, a.create_date, a.remarks, b.name as "sort" FROM content a LEFT JOIN sort b ON b.id = a.sort_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content(name, url, source, create_date, remarks, sort_id) VALUES(#{name}, #{url}, #{source}, #{createDate}, #{remarks}, #{sort})
